Due to unfavorable side effects of some commonly used chemical drugs, there is an increasing trend in the public to use herbal medicines to treat various diseases.
1, 4 Herbal medicine has been widely used for the treatment of mood and anxiety disorders since the ancient times. Nowadays, about 25% of all prescribed drugs are derived from herbs or medicinal plants.
1 Many medicinal plants are recently identified for the treatment of specific disorders, but some others have been used for thousands of years without being recognized by scientists.
